snippet: For proof that the Saints are a different team depending on Pierre Thomas, who gained 121 yards from scrimmage against the Lions, look no further than the previous two seasons.
abstract: New Orleans Saints are hoping to repeat their 2009 title run behind healthy running back Pierre Thomas, after a first-round playoff exit in 2010 without him; are a different team depending on Thomas, an elusive, dynamic game-changer who gained 121 yards from scrimmage in wild-card victory against Detroit Lions.
lead_paragraph: For proof that the Saints are a different team depending on Pierre Thomas, who gained 121 yards from scrimmage against the Lions, look no further than the previous two seasons.

headline.seo: Healthy Pierre Thomas Pushes Forward, Carrying Saints With Him
headline.main: Healthy Running Back Has Saints Recalling Title Run
headline.print_headline: Healthy Running Back Has Saints Recalling Title Run
